text: Agek, bɨ tap gak anɨb ak pen agak, Bɨawl, ñɨg ak kaskas gaknɨŋ, binɨb yɨp dɨl, ñɨg cheb nab ayaŋ lɨnɨgel olap ma mɨdeb agak. Ñɨg nab ayaŋ ned amen ñɨg ak yɨp gek suŋ lɨnɨmuŋ agɨl nepin ak pen, binɨb ogɨnap kasek ned yɨbɨl abal agak.5.7 Juda binɨb okok kɨli anɨgɨl nɨgelɨgɨpal, Bɨawl ensel ne olap gup tek, ñɨn ogɨnap apɨl, am ñɨg cheb ayaŋ kaskas gak. Kaskas gek, bɨ nokom olap ned amɨl ñɨg nab okyaŋ amnɨgab ak, nop suŋ lɨnɨgab. Kɨli anɨgɨl gos nɨgelɨgɨpal anɨb ak, kuŋay yɨbɨl apɨl ñɨg anɨb ak gol okok yelak.
